nodes.description: 2007年6月30日，袭击者驾驶载有燃气罐的汽车冲入格拉斯哥机场航站楼，引发火灾
nodes.support_text: The attack saw a blazing Jeep filled with gas canisters driven into the terminal building on 30 June 2007.

nodes.description: Sgt Torquil Campbell和Pc Stewart Ferguson使用灭火器扑灭火焰，并制服袭击者
nodes.support_text: Pc Ferguson used a fire extinguisher to try to douse the flames and then used it on one of the bombers to stop him attacking colleagues.

nodes.description: Stephen Clarkson用身体压制并制服袭击者
nodes.support_text: Stephen Clarkson punched one of the suspects to the ground before using his bodyweight to restrain him until he was handcuffed.

nodes.description: Michael Kerr在帮助制服嫌疑人时受伤，包括面部受击和腿骨折
nodes.support_text: Mr Kerr... was punched in the face and also suffered a broken leg after going to help a police officer tackle a suspect.

nodes.description: Mr Lambie使用灭火器扑灭火并制服袭击者
nodes.support_text: Mr Lambie helped evacuate people before he tackled the fire with an extinguisher.

nodes.description: Mr McIlveen被CS气体致盲，但协助制服袭击者并引导Pc Kerr
nodes.support_text: Mr McIlveen... was temporarily blinded when CS gas was used to subdue the attackers. He recovered and later led Mr Kerr to safety.

nodes.description: 机场工作人员和公众疏散并协助制服袭击者
nodes.support_text: The response... included community solidarity by emergency service workers, staff from Glasgow Airport and members of the public.

nodes.description: Kafeel Ahmed被捕后因严重烧伤死亡
nodes.support_text: Two men - Kafeel Ahmed and Bilal Abdulla - were arrested... Ahmed later died from serious burns sustained in the attack.
Abdulla was jailed for a minimum of 32 years for his role.

nodes.description: 警员费尔森使用灭火器攻击恐怖分子
nodes.support_text: Pc Ferguson used a fire extinguisher to try to douse the flames and then used it on one of the bombers to stop him attacking colleagues.

nodes.description: 麦当劳先生击打嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: 麦当劳先生击打嫌疑人

nodes.description: 克拉克森先生击倒嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: 克拉克森先生击倒嫌疑人

nodes.description: 克拉克森先生腿部受伤
nodes.support_text: 克拉克森先生腿部受伤

edges.support_text: Sgt Campbell tackled suspects at the airport during the attack, along with Pc Ferguson
Stephen Clarkson, who was working at one of the check-in desks, evacuated people before striking a suspect
Mr Kerr... after going to help a police officer tackle a suspect
Mr Lambie helped evacuate people before he tackled the fire
Mr McIlveen... led Mr Kerr to safety
emergency service workers, staff from Glasgow Airport and members of the public
军士坎贝尔受伤发生在袭击事件后
麦当劳先生击打发生在袭击事件后
克拉克森先生击倒发生在袭击事件后
克拉克森先生腿部受伤发生在袭击事件后
Ahmed later died from serious burns sustained in the attack
警员费尔森在扑灭火焰后使用灭火器攻击恐怖分子
兰比先生逮捕发生在处理火情后
Abdulla was jailed for a minimum of 32 years
